# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s)
    line_len = 0
    lines = []
    for word in words
        if line_len + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, " ")
            line_len = 0
        end
        push!(lines, word)
        line_len += length(word)
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```
Example:
```julia
s = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed nec tellus ut sem venenatis aliquam vitae eget arcu. Nullam ultrices ligula lacus, ac porttitor massa faucibus in. Etiam et nibh sed erat dapibus pretium."
wrap_string(s)
```
Output:
```julia
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,\nconsectetur adipiscing elit.\nSed nec tellus ut sem venenatis\naliquam vitae eget arcu.\nNullam ultrices ligula lacus, ac porttitor\nmassa faucibus in. Etiam et nibh sed erat\ndapibus pretium."
```
